intent.description: What you want to do (e.g., 'explain this transaction', 'decode logs', 'draft a contract call', 'estimate gas').

chain.description: Target chain/network (e.g., ethereum-mainnet, sepolia, polygon, arbitrum).

rpc_url.description: Optional JSON-RPC endpoint URL to query on-chain data.

address.description: Optional wallet or contract address relevant to the request.

abi.description: Optional contract ABI JSON (string). Provide as a JSON string.

data.description: Optional raw calldata, logs, or other payload to decode.
